description: Who is the Crimson Ninja? Just a local girl putting herself though college. Oh yea, the Ninja is also a Jujitsu student. Who is Lyla Lei? Just the first of many victims of the Ninja! The Ninja dominates this match from the start. After pummeling Lyla, it is the Ninja's wish is to have Lyla pleasure her. Unfortunately for her, Lyla will receive no pleasure what so ever, and must submit and sexually service the victor.
title: Lyla Lei and Crimson Ninja
